text: We used SciMAT for the concept analysis. SciMAT adds another analysis step to the alrea- dy described analysis process: Callonâ€™s density and centrality measures, as network measures are detected for each identified cluster (Callon et al., 1991; Cobo et al., 2012). The result of this additional analysis is a strategic map with four sectors (Figure 1).
